title: Last Will of Anna de Trinidade Brazil MCQ 4

content.question: Which of the following was the most significant change in Latin American labor systems between the time the document was produced and 1900 ?

choices.label: Slavery was abolished in all Latin American countries.
Indentured servitude became the main source of labor in most Latin American countries.
Most Latin American countries passed laws limiting the labor of women and children.

content.answer: Slavery was abolished in all Latin American countries.

topic.text: 6.6: Causes of Migration in an Interconnected World

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
